events.title: Cecil Gaines and his wife are guests at a State Dinner in the White House

movie.title: Lee Daniels' The Butler
movie.plot: Cecil Gaines was a sharecropper's son who grew up in the 1920s as a domestic servant for the white family who casually destroyed his. Eventually striking out on his own, Cecil becomes a hotel valet of such efficiency and discreteness in the 1950s that he becomes a butler in the White House itself. There, Cecil would serve numerous US Presidents over the decades as a passive witness of history with the American Civil Rights Movement gaining momentum even as his family has troubles of its own. As his wife, Gloria, struggles with her addictions and his defiant eldest son, Louis, strives for a just world, Cecil must decide whether he should take action in his own way.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 17 wins & 51 nominations.

events.title: Bamm-Bamm, the youngest of the whales, dies

movie.title: Big Miracle
movie.plot: An animal-loving volunteer and a small-town news reporter are joined by a native Alaskan boy to rally an entire community - and eventually rival world superpowers - to save a family of majestic gray whales trapped by rapidly forming ice in the Arctic Circle.

movie.title: Back to the Future Part II
movie.plot: Marty McFly has only just gotten back from the past, when he is once again picked up by Dr. Emmett Brown and sent through time to the future. Marty's job in the future is to pose as his own son to prevent him from being thrown in prison. Unfortunately, things get worse when the future changes the present.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 8 nominations.
